laboratory_examinations.findings: Mild thrombocytopenia (113 × 10⁹ per L, normal 150–400); Hemoglobin concentration 146 g/L (normal 130–180); White blood cell count 7·4 × 10⁹ per L (normal 4–11); Platelet count normalized on follow-up.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Platelet count normalized after initial admission.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Coronavirus detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs, confirmed as 2019-nCoV by sequencing.
